meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Europe Yawns, and Votes The European Union's parliamentary elections concluded, after a dismal turnout and with apathy over the outcome. But in many countries the elections served as a rebuke to the government in power.
Pistons Near Title Detroit beat the Los Angeles Lakers, 88-80, to take a 3-1 lead in the four-of-seven-game N.B.A. finals.

Europe Yawns, and Votes The European Union's parliamentary elections concluded, after a dismal turnout and with apathy over the outcome. But in many countries the elections served as a rebuke to the government in power.
Pistons Near Title Detroit beat the Los Angeles Lakers, 88-80, to take a 3-1 lead in the four-of-seven-game N.B.A. finals.

SPECIAL TODAY A Revolution in Golf In technology, money, fitness and mechanics, significant changes have taken place in professional golf since the United States Open was last held at Shinnecock Hills Golf Club in 1995.
First Space, Then the Prize The goals include a $10 million prize and, ultimately, privately financed space travel. First, a private rocket, below, must fly three people 62 miles above the earth.
